name: Spot Girls Difference
detailed_description:
Spot Girls Difference is a game to find different things. Come on, find different things among all kinds of beautiful women. Every level will have a new beauty, and different places may be in any location of the beauty.




The game includes:

20 checkpoints

20 Sexy Beauty Pictures

Three elegant soundtracks.





Spot Girls Difference combines classical looking for different games and beautiful women pictures to make you absolutely happy to play.

short_description: Spot Girls Difference is a game to find different things. Come on, find different things among all kinds of beautiful women. Every level will have a new beauty, and different places may be in any location of the beauty.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Danish, Ukrainian, Russian, Bulgarian, Hungarian, Turkish, Greek, Norwegian, Czech, Japanese, Polish, Thai, Swedish, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Romanian, Finnish, Dutch, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Vietnamese, Arabic, Korean

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Due E6300 or AMD althon X2 5000+
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 7300GT or ATI X1600
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel I3 6100 or AMD FX6300
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 9600GT or ATI HD4750
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Pictures will contain sexy beauty pictures, pictures have some sexual hints, but do not contain other dew points and pornographic content.
